document_data.name: Destructive Wrath
document_data.deity: [[Aerdrie Faenya]], [[Akadi]], [[Auril]], [[Deep Sashelas]], [[Gruumsh]], [[Malyk (demipower)|Malyk]], [[Istishia]], [[Rellavar Danuvien]], [[Sarula Iliene]], [[Sheela Peryroyl]], [[Talos]], [[Tarsellis Meunniduin]], [[Umberlee]], [[Valkur]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Destructive wrath''''' was a ''[[channel divinity]]'' power granted to [[cleric]]s of the [[tempest domain]].
document_data.Effects: When a cleric used the power of lightning or thunder upon an opponent, this power could be invoked to greatly improve the efficacy and reliability of the effect, making it always the strongest possible.
document_data.Components: No components were necessary to invoke this power.
